description:
Every chess player wants to improve himself and make progress; however, one of the biggest problems is to understand how to do it.

The usual ways of training give very slow progress and even sometimes these are completely ineffective. Finding a GOOD chess coach is also a huge problem. During my chess career as a player and as a coach, I have thought about an effective way of learning all the time.

That’s why I decided to develop a complete chess course, Introducing our top selling chess course “The Grandmaster’s secrets”. With pride I can say that this course will give you only the concrete skills.
title: The Grandmaster’s Techniques – 2nd edition
